name: Motherhood (Dissertation Artifact)
description:
"Motherhood" is a short experience designed specifically to look into how players attach to their characters,  comparing non-human to human characters. esentially, you will play as a mother from two different points of view: as a human and as a cat.

Focused on empathy and compassion, you will have to protect your child, in different ways, from the danger that's surrounding you. 

There is no downside in the gameplay as it was designed for research purposes, but further developpment of the prototype could be an idea for the near future!
